Text: Hey thereHey Mat I havent heard from you since we played phone tag about a month ago Wanted to let you know that I have a trip coming up next week and Ill be passing through IAH Wednesday night around Right now my layover is for only minutes but I may be able to catch an earlier connection out of Denver if youre going to be around that night If youre around Ill call your cell on Wednesday as Im leaving Denver let you know if I catch the earlier connection and maybe you can meet me at the airport for a drink Anyway let me know what your plans are Other than being totally swamped here at work things are good Matt I see each other about once a month and were going to Alaska for two weeks at the beginning of August Let me know how things are with you Becky Kostek CHM Hill The Plaza Building Suite Eleventh Avenue South Birmingham AL Phone ext Fax

RE Hey thereUnfortunately for this particular trip there is no flexibility in my schedule The company is usually very good about this kind of stuff but were in a crunch on this and many projects so its just get out and get back It looks like the best I can do getting an earlier flight is to be in IAH by with my flight to BHam at Wed have to get dinner at the airport unfortunately but its better than nothing Ill call you Wednesday and let you know whats happening Original Message From mailto Sent June PM To Kostek BeckyBHM Subject RE Hey there Becky Well today things suck but overall everything is great I lost about this morning because Im an idiot but its not completely my fault Anyway you should definitely take an earlier flight so we could go to dinner or something Too bad its not at the end of week so you could stay over even though if you wanted to you could I could leave work pretty much anytime on wednesday so just let me know If you dont have my work number its Thanks Mat Original Message From Kostek BeckyBHM HMcomENRON mailtoIMCEANOTESKostekCBeckyBHMCbkostekCHMEcomE NRONcom Sent Wednesday June PM To Smith Matt Subject Hey there Hey Mat I havent heard from you since we played phone tag about a month ago Wanted to let you know that I have a trip coming up next week and Ill be passing through IAH Wednesday night around Right now my layover is for only minutes but I may be able to catch an earlier connection out of Denver if youre going to be around that night If youre around Ill call your cell on Wednesday as Im leaving Denver let you know if I catch the earlier connection and maybe you can meet me at the airport for a drink Anyway let me know what your plans are Other than being totally swamped here at work things are good Matt I see each other about once a month and were going to Alaska for two weeks at the beginning of August Let me know how things are with you Becky Kostek CHM Hill The Plaza Building Suite Eleventh Avenue South Birmingham AL Phone ext Fax

Annual get together Cc Hello I havent heard much from either of you concerning what wed like to do this year I have zero vacation since Matt I are going to Alaska in August for weeks Its not Jazz Fest but I wanted to let you know that we have good events coming up in BHam next month May Crawfish Boil Annual event to raise money for charity Entry fee asked donation Bands good food beer Options to spread a blanket or bring a chair or just wander around and stand in front of stages to choose from See link below for more info May City Stages This is our annual music festival Other cities Atlanta Chattanooga etc have patterned their events from this one thats been going on for over years Ive been once and it was fun multiple stages not Jazz Fest caliber but what is Tickets are day or weekend pass Again food beers etc See link below for more info Just wanted to put the offer out there to see if you guys were interested Obviously wed work it out so that whoever came could stay at my house I figure I can sleep Let me know if youre interested or if youve found anything else we might want to look into Becky Kostek CHM Hill The Plaza Building Suite Eleventh Avenue South Birmingham AL Phone ext Fax
